Texts.Chs: 千万别忘了，^orange;改造台^reset;和^orange;激光挖掘器^reset;都可以进行升级。激光挖掘器升级之后的表现绝对会让你大吃一惊的！
Texts.Eng: Both the ^orange;Tinker Table^reset; and the ^orange;Mining Laser^reset; can be upgraded. You won't want to be without both. The mining laser will really start to shine after a few additions!

Texts.Chs: ^orange;改造台^reset;是极其有用的设备。它能用来强化^green;升级，增强部件，科技^reset;等。试着在你的改造台制作一个^orange;激光挖掘器^reset;。
Texts.Eng: The ^orange;Tinker Table^reset; is an extremely useful device. It can be used to fashion ^green;upgrades, augments, techs^reset; and more. Try making a ^orange;Mining Laser^reset; in yours.
